mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, activity_id AS activityId, take_biz_id AS takeBizId, prize_id AS prizeId, prize_name AS prizeName, prize_type AS prizeType, state, create_time AS createTime FROM user_award_order WHERE take_biz_id = #{takeBizId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_award_order (user_id, activity_id, take_biz_id, prize_id, prize_name, prize_type, state) VALUES (#{userId}, #{activityId}, #{takeBizId}, #{prizeId}, #{prizeName}, #{prizeType}, #{state})
